channel.title: Sketch MeaXure
channel.description: Make it a fun to create spec for developers and teammates

item.title: Version 3.0.0
item.description: Fully works with lastest version of Sketch (v64). The latest Tint feature support. Easily resize markers, without concerns to break them. (The resizing constrain feature) Always export masked layers right, while Measure doesn't in some cases. Customize the order of exported artboards. Better display of text fragments. Re-organize functions and panels.
